name: Morita no Saikyo Shogi
overview: Morita no Saikyou Shogi is a Board game, published by Random House, which was released in Japan in 1999. Shogi, also known as Japanese chess or the Game of Generals, is a two-player strategy board game native to Japan. In the same family as chess, makruk, shatranj, janggi and xiangqi, it is the most popular chess variant in Japan.
